TopicTitle: How can I use mechjeb to consistently achieve an equatorial orbit?

Articles.Content: I\'d like to launch two craft in orbit, ideally pretty close together, but I don\'t really understand all the different settings. Are there any tutorials or can anyone help me out? Thanks!
You can use the 'time launch to rendezvous' option. Select the craft you want to meet up with, and engage the ascent autopilot. It\'ll take things from there.
i agree with cepheus, and if you ever want to dock them when docking is added you can use the rendezous module and select the second craft, quite simple when you learn to use it
